entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
